sections.name: Intro!2x A C#m
lyrics: ***Intro***

sections.name: Couplet
lyrics: Picture perfect memories
Scattered all around the floor
Reaching for the phone cause
I can't fight it anymore
And I wonder if I ever cross your mind
For me it happens all the time

sections.name: Refrain
lyrics: It's a quarter after one
I'm all alone and I need you now
Said I wouldn't call, but I lost all control
And I need you now
And I don't know how I can do without
I just need you now

sections.name: Instru!1x A C#m
lyrics: ***Instru***

sections.name: Couplet
lyrics: Another shot of whisky
Can't stop looking at the door
Wishing you'd come sweeping in the way you did before
And I wonder if I ever cross your mind
For me it happens all the time

sections.name: Refrain
lyrics: It's a quarter after one
I'm a little drunk and I need you now
Said I wouldn't call, but I lost all control
And I need you now
And I don't know how I can do without
I just need you now

sections.name: Solo
lyrics: ***Solo***

sections.name: Pont
lyrics: Guess I rather hurt than feel nothing at all

sections.name: Refrain
lyrics: It's a quarter after one
I'm all alone and I need you now
And I said I wouldn't call
But I'm a little drunk and I need you now
And I don't know how I can do without
I just need you now

sections.name: Outro
lyrics: I just need you now
Oh, baby, I need you now
